info.title: PRA Revenue Accounting Document - Post/Simulate/Read
info.description:
You can read the Revenue Accounting Document Header, Items, Tax, Marketing and Tax information related to Revenue Accounting Document.

You can simulate and Posting Revenue Accounting Document

x-sap-shortText: Production and Revenue Accounting Document inbound service allows read, simulation and posting of Revenue Accounting Document

values.text: [Revenue Accounting - Oil and Gas Production(5NM)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/5NM " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET PRARevenueAccountingHeader HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
